admissions_process: Admissions to Bennett University are based on entrance exams such as JEE Main / BU Entrance Test / SAT, followed by counseling and document verification. Candidates apply online through the official admissions portal.
admissions_last_date: The typical last date to apply for undergraduate admissions is around June; please check the official website for the exact current deadline.
btech_eligibility: For B.Tech at Bennett University, candidates generally need to have completed 10+2 with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with one of Chemistry/Computer Science/Informatic Practices, and must have a valid score in JEE Main, SAT or BU Entrance Test.
btech_fees: The approximate tuition fee for B.Tech at Bennett University is in the range of 3.5â€“4.5 lakhs per year, depending on the program and batch. Hostel and other charges are additional.
hostel_info: Bennett University provides on-campus hostel facilities for both boys and girls with options like AC rooms, Wi-Fi, laundry, mess, common rooms and 24x7 security.
hostel_fees: Hostel fees at Bennett University depend on room type (AC/Non-AC, single/double/triple sharing) and are usually charged annually in addition to tuition fees.
scholarships: Bennett University offers merit-based scholarships based on entrance exam scores and academic performance. Specific scholarship slabs are usually based on JEE Main percentile or equivalent scores.
placements_overview: Bennett University has a dedicated Career Services team that conducts placement drives, internships and industry interactions. Many reputed companies visit campus for recruitment every year.
average_package: The average package for B.Tech students at Bennett University varies by batch and branch, but is generally in a competitive range for private universities.
highest_package: The highest package offered at Bennett University varies each year and may include both domestic and international offers. For the latest exact figure, refer to the official placement report.
campus_location: Bennett University is located in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh, near Knowledge Park II, with good connectivity from Delhi and Noida.
transport: Students typically reach Bennett University via personal transport, cabs or metro plus last-mile connectivity. The nearest metro stations are usually in Noida, from where cabs or buses can be taken to campus.
student_life: Bennett University has an active campus life with multiple student clubs, technical societies, cultural events, hackathons and sports activities throughout the year.
contact_admissions: For admissions-related queries, students can contact the Bennett University admissions team via the official website contact form or the published admissions helpline numbers and email IDs.
website: You can visit the official Bennett University website at https://www.bennett.edu.in for the most accurate and updated information.
